original_text: Some other guards kept safe the tools and the valuable things that were in the Holy Place. Some guards took care of the flour, wine, olive oil, incense and spices.
korean_text: 또 어떤 자는 성소의 기구와 모든 그릇과 고운 가루와 포도주와 기름과 유향과 향품을 맡았으며

sentences.original_text: Some other guards kept safe the tools
sentences.korean_translation: 다른 몇몇 경비병들은 기구들을 안전하게 지켰다

sentences.original_text: that were in the Holy Place
Some guards took care of the flour
wine, olive oil, incense and spices
